nodes.title: First Day of High School
nodes.description: Starting fresh at a new school, nervous but excited.

nodes.title: Jake from Band Class
nodes.description: Met Jake in band class. Would become a lifelong friend.

nodes.title: First Concert Experience
nodes.description: Seeing live music for the first time changed everything.

nodes.title: Started Drawing Daily
nodes.description: New Year's resolution that actually stuck. Filled three sketchbooks.

nodes.title: Orlando, FL
nodes.description: Home base. Theme parks and humidity.

nodes.title: High School Art Portfolio
nodes.description: Curated a portfolio of drawings and digital art for AP class.

nodes.title: Family Trip to Universal Studios
nodes.description: Riding the Hulk coaster for the first time with the whole family.

nodes.title: First Photoshop Creation
nodes.description: Discovered Photoshop. Made terrible forum signatures. Loved every minute.

nodes.title: Mom
nodes.description: The one who always believed in the creative path.

nodes.title: Discovered Web Design
nodes.description: Found a 'How to Make a Website' tutorial. Mind blown.

nodes.title: First Personal Website
nodes.description: HTML tables, animated GIFs, visitor counter. Peak 2007.

nodes.title: SeaWorld Adventures
nodes.description: Summer days at SeaWorld with the family.

nodes.title: CSS is Magic
nodes.description: The moment CSS clicked and layouts became possible.

nodes.title: MySpace Page Customization
nodes.description: Became the go-to MySpace page designer for friends.

nodes.title: Flash Animation Experiments
nodes.description: ActionScript 2.0 and frame-by-frame animation. RIP Flash.

nodes.title: High School Art Teacher
nodes.description: Pushed me to apply to design programs. Changed the trajectory.

nodes.title: Won Local Art Competition
nodes.description: First external validation that this creative thing might go somewhere.

nodes.title: Applied to Design School
nodes.description: Submitted the portfolio. The waiting was the hardest part.

nodes.title: Design Can Be a Career
nodes.description: The realization that people get paid to make things beautiful.

nodes.title: Accepted to College
nodes.description: The acceptance letter that changed everything.

nodes.title: Senior Capstone Website
nodes.description: Full website built from scratch for senior project.

nodes.title: High School Graduation
nodes.description: End of one chapter, beginning of the next.

nodes.title: Summer Road Trip
nodes.description: Cross-country drive before college. Saw the Grand Canyon.

nodes.title: The World is Bigger Than Orlando
nodes.description: Standing on the rim of the Grand Canyon, perspective shifted.

nodes.title: Last Summer Before College
nodes.description: Bittersweet weeks of hanging out before everyone scattered.

nodes.title: First Day of College
nodes.description: New city, new people, new everything. Terrified and thrilled.

nodes.title: Roommate Alex
nodes.description: Random roommate assignment turned into a great friendship.

nodes.title: Typography I Final
nodes.description: First formal design project. Helvetica everywhere.

nodes.title: First College Party
nodes.description: Awkward but memorable. Found the creative crowd.

nodes.title: Professor Martinez
nodes.description: Design foundations professor who demanded perfection.

nodes.title: Typography is Communication
nodes.description: Every typeface choice is a voice. Professor Martinez drilled this in.

nodes.title: Design Cohort Crew
nodes.description: The late-night studio crew. We pushed each other.

nodes.title: Brand Identity Project
nodes.description: Created a full brand system for a fictional coffee shop.

nodes.title: All-Nighter in the Studio
nodes.description: Pizza boxes, energy drinks, and the best work of the semester.

nodes.title: UI Design Course Final
nodes.description: Designed a weather app mockup. First taste of interaction design.

nodes.title: Good Design is Invisible
nodes.description: Reading Dieter Rams. The best interface is no interface.

nodes.title: Discovered JavaScript
nodes.description: jQuery animations. Everything was .fadeIn() and .slideToggle().

nodes.title: Study Abroad Semester
nodes.description: Design program abroad. Different perspectives on everything.

nodes.title: Portfolio Website v2
nodes.description: Rebuilt from scratch with actual JavaScript. Responsive this time.

nodes.title: Design Competition Win
nodes.description: Student design competition. Our team took first place.

nodes.title: Barcelona, Spain
nodes.description: Gaudi blew my mind. Architecture as organic sculpture.

nodes.title: Code + Design = Superpower
nodes.description: Realized designers who code are rare and valuable.

nodes.title: First Freelance Client
nodes.description: Got paid real money to design a logo. Professional designer status.

nodes.title: Gaudi's Sagrada Familia Visit
nodes.description: Standing inside felt like being in a living organism.

nodes.title: Senior Thesis: Interactive Data Viz
nodes.description: D3.js data visualization for thesis project.

nodes.title: Freelance Logo Projects
nodes.description: Word of mouth brought in five more clients. Side hustle was real.

nodes.title: Nature-Inspired Design
nodes.description: Gaudi taught me: the best designs come from observing nature.

nodes.title: College Graduation
nodes.description: BFA in hand. Ready to take on the design world.

nodes.title: Graduation Road Trip
nodes.description: Celebratory trip with the design cohort crew.

nodes.title: Family Celebration Dinner
nodes.description: Mom cried. Dad was proud. Best dinner ever.

nodes.title: Ready to Build Things That Matter
nodes.description: Post-graduation clarity. Design isn't just aesthetics -- it's problem solving.

nodes.title: First Full-Time Design Job
nodes.description: Junior designer at a digital agency. Real deadlines, real clients.

nodes.title: Design Mentor Sarah
nodes.description: Senior designer who taught me agency survival skills.

nodes.title: Downtown Agency Office
nodes.description: Open floor plan, standing desks, too much cold brew.

nodes.title: Agency Client: Restaurant Chain Rebrand
nodes.description: First major client project. Logo, menus, signage, the works.

nodes.title: First Design Review
nodes.description: Presenting to the creative director. Nerve-wracking. Survived.

nodes.title: Learned React
nodes.description: Components changed everything. Goodbye jQuery spaghetti.

nodes.title: Ship Fast, Iterate Faster
nodes.description: Agency pace taught me: done is better than perfect.

nodes.title: First React App Shipped
nodes.description: Internal tool for the agency. React + Redux. State management nightmares.

nodes.title: Promoted to Mid-Level Designer
nodes.description: One year in, leading small projects independently.

nodes.title: Carbonmade Portfolio
nodes.description: Built and maintained a Carbonmade portfolio to showcase work.

nodes.title: Coffee Shop Regulars
nodes.description: The morning crew at the local coffee shop. Community found in routine.

nodes.title: Launched Carbonmade Redesign
nodes.description: Major redesign of the Carbonmade portfolio platform.

nodes.title: The Local Coffee Shop
nodes.description: Where half the side projects were born.

nodes.title: Carbonmade Launch Day
nodes.description: Refreshing analytics. Watching the traffic spike. Pure adrenaline.

nodes.title: Side Project: CSS Animation Library
nodes.description: Open-source CSS animation utilities. Got 200 GitHub stars.

nodes.title: Product Design > Agency Work
nodes.description: Building a product felt more meaningful than client rotations.

nodes.title: Node.js Backend Experiments
nodes.description: Building APIs. Full-stack dreams becoming reality.

nodes.title: Left Agency for Product Role
nodes.description: Jumped to a product company. Scary but right.

nodes.title: First Open Source Contribution
nodes.description: PR merged to a popular library. Part of something bigger.

nodes.title: Design System from Scratch
nodes.description: Built a component library for the new product team.

nodes.title: Open Source is Community
nodes.description: Contributing to open source is about people, not just code.

nodes.title: Design Systems Manifesto
nodes.description: Wrote an internal doc that became the team's north star.

nodes.title: Met Jake at Conference
nodes.description: Tech conference connection. Different Jake. Same energy.

nodes.title: Design System Talk at Meetup
nodes.description: First public talk. Hands shaking, slides solid.

nodes.title: Austin, TX
nodes.description: SXSW and tacos. Austin has a vibe.

nodes.title: Teaching Deepens Understanding
nodes.description: Explaining design systems to others solidified my own thinking.

nodes.title: Conference Inspiration Overload
nodes.description: So many ideas, not enough notebooks.

nodes.title: Moved to Senior Role
nodes.description: Senior Product Designer. Finally felt like I belonged.

nodes.title: Portfolio Website v3
nodes.description: React + Three.js. The 3D era begins.

nodes.title: Product Team Alpha
nodes.description: The best team I ever worked with. We shipped magic.

nodes.title: 3D on the Web is the Future
nodes.description: Three.js opened a portal to a new dimension of web design.

nodes.title: User Research Initiative
nodes.description: Pushed for user interviews. Data-driven design, not assumptions.

nodes.title: Shipped Product Redesign
nodes.description: Complete product overhaul. Six months of work, one big launch.

nodes.title: Three.js Globe Experiment
nodes.description: Built an interactive 3D globe. The seed of jarowe.com.

nodes.title: User Interview That Changed Design Direction
nodes.description: One user's feedback completely reshaped the product vision.

nodes.title: Product Launch Celebration
nodes.description: Team dinner. Champagne. We actually did it.

nodes.title: Personal Sites Should Be Experiences
nodes.description: Why settle for a static resume when the web can be immersive?

nodes.title: Empathy is a Design Skill
nodes.description: Listening to users isn't a checkbox. It's the whole methodology.

nodes.title: Jace
nodes.description: Little buddy who makes everything an adventure.

nodes.title: WebGL Shader Experiments
nodes.description: Fragment shaders, noise functions, and beautiful chaos.

nodes.title: Accessibility Audit Project
nodes.description: Led a full accessibility audit. Made the product usable for everyone.

nodes.title: Orlando Trip with Family
nodes.description: Back to the theme parks, but now through a kid's eyes.

nodes.title: Shaders are Programmable Art
nodes.description: Every pixel is a calculation. Math becomes visual poetry.

nodes.title: WCAG AA Compliance Achieved
nodes.description: Product passed full WCAG AA audit. Inclusive by design.

nodes.title: Universal Studios with Jace
nodes.description: His first roller coaster. The screams were legendary.

nodes.title: Generative Art Collection
nodes.description: Series of algorithm-generated art pieces. Each one unique.

nodes.title: Led Workshop on Accessible Design
nodes.description: Taught the whole team about accessibility. Proud moment.

nodes.title: SeaWorld with the Crew
nodes.description: Kraken, Mako, Manta -- riding everything in one day.

nodes.title: Creative Coding Livestreams
nodes.description: Started streaming creative coding sessions. Small but dedicated audience.

nodes.title: Design Leadership is Teaching
nodes.description: The best design leaders make others better, not just ship features.

nodes.title: VelociCoaster Photo Album
nodes.description: Documenting the coaster adventures. Photos that capture pure joy.

nodes.title: Hit 1000 Followers
nodes.description: Small milestone, big feeling. People care about what I make.

nodes.title: Promoted to Lead Designer
nodes.description: Leading a team of four. Imposter syndrome is real.

nodes.title: SeaWorld Orlando
nodes.description: The home of Kraken, Mako, and Ice Breaker. Family favorite.

nodes.title: Newsletter Launch
nodes.description: Weekly design newsletter. Writing forces clarity.

nodes.title: First Team All-Hands I Led
nodes.description: Standing in front of 30 people. Voice steady. Vision clear.

nodes.title: Ice Breaker Opening Day
nodes.description: New coaster at SeaWorld. First riders. Worth the wait.

nodes.title: Pandemic Pivot
nodes.description: Everything changed. Remote work became the norm overnight.

nodes.title: Remote Work Can Actually Work
nodes.description: Initial skepticism gave way to a new way of operating.

nodes.title: Home Office Setup
nodes.description: Ergonomic chair, dual monitors, ring light. The WFH upgrade.

nodes.title: Pandemic Side Projects
nodes.description: With nowhere to go, built three side projects in two months.

nodes.title: Virtual Team Building Attempts
nodes.description: Zoom game nights. Awkward but necessary.

nodes.title: Home Office
nodes.description: The room that became HQ for the next three years.

nodes.title: Starseed Music Project
nodes.description: Music meets code. Generative audio visualization.

nodes.title: Remote Collaborators
nodes.description: Never met in person but built great things together.

nodes.title: Environment Shapes Output
nodes.description: A good workspace isn't luxury -- it's a tool.

nodes.title: First Suno Track Published
nodes.description: AI-assisted music creation. A new creative frontier.

nodes.title: Beamy Project Launch
nodes.description: Collaborative design tool concept. From idea to prototype.

nodes.title: Backyard Adventures with Jace
nodes.description: Pandemic silver lining: more time with the little one.

nodes.title: Music Visualization Tool
nodes.description: Real-time audio visualization with WebAudio API and Canvas.

nodes.title: Started Independent Consulting
nodes.description: Took the leap. Own clients, own schedule, own destiny.

nodes.title: Dad
nodes.description: The quiet supporter. Shows love through actions, not words.

nodes.title: Music and Code Are the Same Language
nodes.description: Patterns, rhythm, composition -- both are creative expression in structure.

nodes.title: Consulting Client: SaaS Dashboard
nodes.description: Designed and built a complete analytics dashboard.

nodes.title: Father's Day Fishing Trip
nodes.description: Caught nothing. Best day ever.

nodes.title: Home Studio
nodes.description: Upgraded from home office to full creative studio.

nodes.title: AI Art Experiments
nodes.description: Stable Diffusion, Midjourney, DALL-E. The tools are incredible.

nodes.title: SD Profile Patcher Tool
nodes.description: Built a tool for Stable Diffusion profile management.

nodes.title: Family Vacation to Universal
nodes.description: Multi-generational trip. Everyone together.

nodes.title: Personal Brand Refresh
nodes.description: New logo, new colors, new energy for jarowe.com.

nodes.title: AI is a Collaborator, Not a Replacement
nodes.description: The best results come from human + AI creative partnership.

nodes.title: Patcher Tool Goes Viral
nodes.description: Reddit picked it up. 10K users in a week.

nodes.title: VelociCoaster with the Family
nodes.description: The best roller coaster experience. Everyone screaming, everyone laughing.

nodes.title: jarowe.com Globe Feature
nodes.description: The interactive 3D globe that became the site's centerpiece.

nodes.title: Prompt Engineering Deep Dive
nodes.description: Mastering the art of talking to AI. Context is everything.

nodes.title: Build Tools People Actually Need
nodes.description: The Patcher proved it: solve a real problem, people will find it.

nodes.title: Universal Studios Islands of Adventure
nodes.description: VelociCoaster, Hulk, Hagrid's. The holy trinity.

nodes.title: Garden Page Design
nodes.description: Digital garden concept. Cards, categories, growth metaphor.

nodes.title: Claude Code Workflow
nodes.description: Developing a systematic workflow for AI-assisted coding.

nodes.title: Workshop Page
nodes.description: Showcase for tools and experiments. The maker's corner.

nodes.title: Hulk Coaster Night Ride
nodes.description: Night rides hit different. City lights below, stars above.

nodes.title: Universe Page Launch
nodes.description: Interactive 3D universe with orbiting nodes. Easter eggs everywhere.

nodes.title: Systematic Creativity
nodes.description: Process doesn't kill creativity -- it channels it.

nodes.title: Workshop Featured on Dev.to
nodes.description: Someone wrote about the Workshop page. Unexpected recognition.

nodes.title: Theme Park Friends
nodes.description: The crew that plans every park trip. Annual pass holders united.

nodes.title: jarowe.com v5 Cinematic Globe
nodes.description: The site reached a new level. Multi-layer shaders, day-night cycle, lens flare.

nodes.title: Daily Cipher Game
nodes.description: Wordle-clone with vault integration. Easter eggs within easter eggs.

nodes.title: Every Site Should Have Surprises
nodes.description: Hidden interactions make the web feel alive again.

nodes.title: Penguin Trek Opening
nodes.description: New SeaWorld ride. Jace was first in line.

nodes.title: Bento Grid Home Page
nodes.description: Interactive bento layout with 3D tilt, confetti, XP system.

nodes.title: Vault Reward System
nodes.description: Solve the cipher, unlock the vault, see the roller coaster photos.

nodes.title: Konami Code Easter Egg
nodes.description: Hidden cheat code triggers confetti explosion and XP bonus.

nodes.title: SeaWorld Penguin Trek
nodes.description: The newest ride. Cold air, cute penguins, happy kids.

nodes.title: The Constellation Project Begins
nodes.description: Every moment, every connection, every discovery -- mapped in 3D space.

nodes.title: Life is a Constellation
nodes.description: Every experience connects to every other. The pattern only emerges when you zoom out.

nodes.title: GameOverlay XP Milestone
nodes.description: The XP system reached 50 interactions tracked. People are playing.

nodes.title: Mako Friends Photo
nodes.description: On-ride photo from Mako. Everyone's face is priceless.
